text: Selena Gomez is no stranger to fame — or the endless barrage of criticism and scrutiny that women in her position ( and all positions ) face. In a new video shared to Instagram, Selena hits out against “ the beauty myth ” which demands “ physical perfection ” and fuels “ self - hatred. ” She began the caption with a definition : “ The beauty myth, ” Selena wrote. “ An obsession with physical perfection that traps modern woman in an endless cycle of hopelessness, self consciousness, and self - hatred as she tries to fulfill society ’ s impossible definition of flawless beauty. ” The accompanying video shows Gomez relaxing on a boat with friends in Sydney, Australia. Grainy, retro shots of the famed harbor bridge and the Sydney Opera House are set to “ Dreams Tonite ” by Alvvays.
